Seemingly without end, this long and incredibly dark hallway stretches out before you into the darkness beyond. At the end of the hall in the distance is a faint, sputtering candle standing squarely before a closed door.
Standing before the door is a lit candle, it's tiny flame nearly insignificant against the pressing darkness of the long hallway.
The ceiling overhead is low and oppressive.
At the end of the hall is a closed door. Standing in front of the door is a single, sputtering candle.
The walls of the hallway are oppressively close and unbroken by any doors or windows save for the lone door at the farthest end of the hall.
